==Dialogue==
{{Dialogue start}}
:'''Behnam:''' Hello. How can I help you?
:{{DIcon}} Who are you?
::'''Behnam:''' The Akademiya sent me here to take charge of overseeing and maintaining the fortification work at the desert's edge. I usually stay in the pitstop.
::'''Behnam:''' The rainforest is of utmost importance to the lives of Sumeru's people. We can't allow the desert to erode it.
::'''Behnam:''' Wall of Samiel is our key defense against the sandstorm. We must practice thorough and effective defense with it.
:{{DIcon}} See you.
::'''Behnam:''' See you.
{{Dialogue end}}
